data.author: Wolfgang Merkt
data.message:
Merge pull request #134 from clalancette/clalancette/switch-octomap-dep

Switch to the system-provided octomap library.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Switch to the system-provided octomap library.

This ensures that we don't use the ROS-provided one,
which can lead to ABI problems.  We'll eventually remove
the ROS-provided one.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.message: Update changelog for next release (0.6.3)

data.author: Wolfgang Merkt
data.message:
Fix compilation on Debian Stretch
- Debian Stretch suffered from linking issues due to Qt5Widgets not being found.
- This was resolved upstream in pcl_ros, which also includes and correctly exports pcl dependencies.
- Thus by removing the explicit search for PCL libraries resolves this issue.

data.author: Brandon Kinman
data.message:
Fixed maxRange bug in OctomapServer.cpp

It's possible for a voxel at sensor_model/max_range to be set, but not cleared.
This small change ensures that voxels at max_range get cleared properly.
